title: Dance Mums with Jennifer Ellison
text:
Dance Mums with Jennifer Ellison is a British <a href="reality%20television">reality television</a> series that made its debut on <a href="Lifetime%20%28UK%20and%20Ireland%29">Lifetime</a> on 20 October 2014. Created by <a href="Shiver%20Productions">Shiver Productions</a>, it is set in <a href="Liverpool">Liverpool</a>, England, at Jelli Studios and follows the early careers of children in dance and show business, as well as the participation of their mothers. It is a <a href="Spin-off%20%28media%29">spin-off</a> of the American TV series "<a href="Dance%20Moms">Dance Moms</a>".
The second series began airing on 12 October 2015.
Dance Mums was not commissioned for a third series.
Premise.
The series follows <a href="Jennifer%20Ellison">Jennifer Ellison</a>, the owner of The Jennifer Ellison Fame Academy in <a href="Liverpool">Liverpool</a>, England, as she coaches 7 girls towards the goal of competing in the Dance World Cup in Portugal.
